Name: Void Council
Description:
Faction Name: The Illuminati
World: A futuristic city where magic is the norm
Moed: 1745
Era: Early Renaissance
Power Structure: Magical factions, humans with power abilities, and an all-powerful sorcerer council
Central Conflict: Restore order in a world where magic has been corrupted by dark forces
Goal: Reclaim the city's lost brightness and restore balance to the magical realm
Territory: The Illuminati's capital, the heart of the city's mage-dominated society. It includes all of the city's palaces, temples, and schools.
